member.name: M:TransactionRepository.ITransactionRepository.GetAPITransactionDetail(TransactionRepository.Models.APIRequest,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the Transaction Detail of the tranno passed in . If using older version than v10, pass v9 in version parameter
member.param: Pass APIRequest model as a parameter
if using older version than v10, pass this parameter as v9
if masking is not done in Database,use as optional
member.para: is returned from the store procedure spa_GetAPI_transaction. if older version then make sure you have store procedure exists as spa_GetAPI_transaction_Connect
